name: Classic Island: Super Platform
description:
Super Adventures Classic island is very simple but very interesting game. Classic island is a classic platform game with a journey of super boy (Sboy) that brings your childhood back. This classic game will make you addict to. The task facing the player: run to the end of the whole level before time runs out. Let's help the hero save the girlfriend from the evil doctor in the adventure in island.

Features:
* All Classic Levels.
* Global Leaderboards.
* Great graphics and music.
* Suitable for all ages.
* Over 20 enemies and power up obstacles
* Now try to get a higher score and share it with your friends!
* New levels update every week.
* Free to play, play it anywhere anytime.

Enjoy!
